section_subtitle: Here you will find answers to the most important questions.
try_filters: Try changing the category filter or clear your search.

faq.a1: PierogiCoin (PRG) is a community-driven token merging tradition with innovation. We aim to build a secure and fun ecosystem backed by real value.
faq.q2: How can I get PierogiCoin tokens?
faq.a2: We are not selling tokens traditionally yet. You can secure an allocation by: 1) Playing our Telegram Game, 2) Contributing to the Audit Funding Hub.
faq.q3: What is the utility of PRG?
faq.a3: PRG is the heart of the ecosystem. It's used for staking, game rewards, and in the future, for payments at partner restaurants.
faq.q4: Has the smart contract been audited?
faq.a4: That's exactly what we are raising funds for! We are in the 'Play-to-Audit' phase. We won't launch the main sale until CertiK or Hacken confirms our code is 100% secure.
faq.a5: First Audit (Q1 2025), then Public Launch, CEX listings, and expanding the PierogiCoin gaming universe.
faq.q6: How can I join the community?
faq.a6: Join our Telegram and Discord! That's where the action is – daily discussions, memes, and direct access to the team.
faq.q7: Why fund the audit through a game?
faq.a7: Because we believe in transparency. Instead of seeking VCs, we prefer the community to fund the audit and own the project's success.
faq.q8: How does the Telegram game help?
faq.a8: Revenue from game ads and voluntary donations goes 100% to the Audit Vault. You play for free, and we gather funds for security.
faq.a9: Only after a successful audit. We target Q1 2025. User fund security is our top priority.
faq.a10: Yes, after the official Token Generation Event (TGE), tokens earned in-game will be unlocked and tradable on exchanges.

cta.title: Do you have more questions?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and get answers.
